divs: Sighting Detailsi had decided to take my vacation on the 4 of july and this year go camping at tolland state forest in mass. it was a tuesday night around 11:30pm the heat was scorching all day long and the night wasnt any better .it must have been 85 degrees at 11pm . just before i call it a day i usually grab my binnoculars and look at the stars. my binnoculars are made for looking at the stars they are 80*100 power . being in the woods camping is great for star watching because it pitch black .anyways i started watching what i thought was a satelight moveing slowly across the sky and out of boardem i started to watch .within 3 seconds there was a bright flash of wight light ,the brightest light i ever seen come from what i thought was a satelight. it wasnt just the light that amazed me it was the speed and distance all at once. the only way to discribe it is as if you are watching a shooting star except the star doesnt stop it just keeps going across the sky,and then take a left turn going that fast. it was amazing to watch. there was a time when i use to look for these things ,and it was nice this one came to me .
